entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore was already at the foot of the steps when the Death Eaters nearest realized he was there.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: There were yells; one of the Death Eaters ran for it, scrabbling like a monkey up the stone steps opposite.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry saw Sirius duck Bellatrix’s jet of red light: He was laughing at her.

relationships.description: Dumble dore’s spell pulled him back as easily and effortlessly as though he  had hooked him with an invisible line —
Harry saw Sirius duck Bellatrix’s jet of red light: He was laughing at her.
